content.label: A blast to play. Totally addictive.
Sit back, relax, and enjoy this great game :)
Í≥†ÏöîÌïú ÎäêÎÇå Ï¢ãÏùå
This game makes me think in ways I'm not used to. The snowman running around is very fun. It's a very nice noncompetitive game that really encourages creative thinking. I love this game!
Wonderful game, very soothing. But hard puzzles!
This is a wonderful puzzle game, it is aesthetically pleasing and is very challenging!

To everybody who says the game is too short: after the basic 30 levels there is a masterful puzzle after the end. It is much harder than the basic puzzles, but not impossibly hard. It puts the game into a whole new league! 

If you haven't bought the game, don't trust those who say it is too short. They haven't found the best challenge. The game is more than worth the money.
Crashes every 30 seconds on iPad 2. Not playable
Interesting, but unstable. Crashes to the home screen every minute or so on an iPhone 6s. Can't recommend at this time, and certainly not for $5.

This was a very fun game. I love puzzles but after completing the whole thing I was disappointed to find there wasn't a next stage or level. For the money I paid I expect more. You pay 99c for cut the rope and you have 100 levels. Again great game needs more content. I like to be challenged and wanted it to get harder
Very nicely executed and beautiful to look at, but too short for the $5 price, which for an app usually means a much longer experience.  I finished this game in about an hour.

It's a cute game, but super short. Really short. The puzzles have a slight variety, however the game has only one level. ‚òπÔ∏è 

This was recommended because I liked The Room 3, which is longer and has much more diverse puzzles. Not worth the money in my opinion.
its grate

Really amazing game! Its a great way to get the brain working with these puzzles

title.label: Buy this if you like puzzles.

content.label: This game is cute and almost minimalistic, but still moderately challenging. There are many snowmen to create and all require a new tactic to learn in order to create them. This is a fantastic  game for if you want to try to solve one puzzle a day or something.

name.label: A guy who knows his stuff

content.label: While it mate not look like much, A Good Snowman is Hard to Build is a wonderful game. While it is simple and short, this game doesn't pretend it is anything more than what it is. Charming, calming, and an excellent multifaceted puzzler. Don't overlook this game, for it is something special.
Great game
Great

This game took me, and will hopefully take you, on a calm-conundrum.

Draknek‚Äôs Monster is a quiet creature, with human like idiosyncrasies, and a treasuring desire to build a good snowman. The angelic soundscape locks you into a world of peace and purity. 
 
The ending...? is quite dark and nihilistic (Nietzsche would approve).
I had no problem figuring out the controls and I'm enjoying the slow, calming pace of the game. I also appreciate the back and start-over buttons as well!
Superb game. Very polished. Wrings maximum value out of a simple concept and gradually and smoothly grows harder. Final puzzle just about defeated me. Five stars. Maybe a minor classic.
I just spent $4.99 on an app that keeps crashing! I will update my review when you guys fix it.

title.label: Perfect for Car or Dr appt waiting room!

content.label: I crave the challenges of making these snowmen. If they were too hard, I wouldn't have become a "repeat" glutton for these strategic holiday puzzles. Lacking a bit of instruction, but it was manageable.
Great game so far, but seems a little short

Contrary to what others say, this app is easy to figure out, but the high price and the constant crashing are not worth it. Try the skiing game with Alto if you want a snow game with beautiful music and graphics that works.
Very enjoyable to play but a little short... It would be nice if there were an expansion pack for more levels..
I was skeptical at first about spending $5 but as soon as I got the game I couldn't put it down. My favorite iOS game so far.

Very well done game!
Close attention to the little details like being able to sit on a bench and then a though bubble pops up and asks if I'd like to rate this game. Well worth the price!

I agree with other posters that I had some trouble figuring out the mechanics from the tutorial, and initially thought I'd be bored in a few minutes, but here I am 30 minutes later having fun! The pace picks up after you figure out the "laws of physics" of the game. The named snowmen are a cute touch.
So adorable and challenging. And you can hug snowmen!
Great puzzle game with a very charming art style.

Can't play because it crashes during the tutorial on my iPad 2. This is especially depressing because it's an awfully expensive app to begin with. I will remove this review once an update is submitted that fixes the problem. Until then, save your money.
This is a very well-designed video game and also it is totally cute. Recommended for everyone!

title.label: A little bummed out to be honest.

content.label:
I was actually waiting for this game to come out. I bought it as soon as I saw it.

I was a little disappointed in the lack of  tutorial/explanation. (Hence the 3 star rating). I would have loved to see a little character personality for the black marshmallow looking guy. You even leave the game controls and functionality for the player to figure out on his own, which I didn't like.  

I've played for about 45 minutes, got a good chuck of the map already done. Don't know if that's all I get but I already feel this is not worth 5 bucks. 

I can't honestly say I've had a bad time with the game. But right now it seams overpriced or maybe a little rushed because of the Christmas season.

I'll gladly rewrite my review right as and if I change my mind.
